name: Tale of a Tiny Troublemaker
description:
Welcome!

Tale of a Tiny Troublemaker is a student project meant to explore Unity.

To Play:

Movement - Arrow keys, A & D

Jump - Space bar

Bark Attack (After Obtaining PowerUp) - Left Click

"Paws" Menu - Escape

Known Bugs:

Quit from Pause Menu does not always work - it will work properly from Main Menu
